map.entry: Finished with one or more exceptions or errors below.
Finished with one or more exceptions or errors above.
Retrying without saving items to save space in database.

Are you sure you want to delete?
Press \1 to toggle on/off auto scroll.
Press \1 to go one line forward.
Press \1 to go one line back.
Press \1 to go to the link
Press \1 to go back to the previous screen.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Are you sure you want to clear all data?
Are you sure you want to quit without saving data?
Are you sure you want to export? This can cause endless prompts on some phones.
Database error while loading saved feeds.
Out Of Memory Error while parsing RSS data \1
Parsing HTML redirect cannot be processed.
Out Of Memory Error loading settings form
Out Of Memory Error loading help form
Out Of Memory Error loading bookmark form
Out Of Memory Error getting file form.
Error during save out of memory.
Error saving feeds to database. Database error.
Error saving feeds to database. Database full.
Out Of Memory Error importing feeds from \1
Error while trying to open/load feed \1
Out of memory loading feed on: \1
Out of memory parsing feed on: \1
Error: Feed already exists with name \1 Existing feed not updated.
To start go to manage bookmarks and look at help.
To start go to add bookmark to start adding feeds or Import to import feeds to add/import feeds. Use help present in these forms.
Go back to main bookmarks to open feed/bookmark, update, and other commands.
Update all modified feeds. Only feeds which show as modified from where they are published are modified. This can save some time.
Insert bookmark (feed) before current selected element on the previous bookmarks list
Add bookmark (feed) after the current selected element on the previous bookmarks list
Append bookmark (feed) at the end of previous bookmarks list
Name to use for bookmark (feed). The name must be unique within the bookmarks.
Import bookmarks (feeds) from OPML, HTML hyperlinks, HTML OPML auto links, HTML RSS auto links
Line by line has either lines with URL followed by space by bookmark (feed) name. Or, just URLs where the URL will be used as the URL and the name.
Insert bookmark (feed) before current selected element on previous bookmarks list
Add bookmark (feed) after current selected element on previous bookmarks list
Append bookmark (feed) at the end of previous bookmarks list

Override bookmarks will replace an existing bookmark if it has the same name as a bookmark (feed) in the import file with the bookmark (feed) in the import file. The replaced bookmark will remain in the same place in the boookmark list even if the other bookmarks are put into a different place in the list. If using don't override, if there is a bookmark (feed) with the same name, it will not be replaced and an error message will be given, but other bookmarks in the import will be added if they are unique.
Update settings, see resource usage, program and phone info.
For phones that support copy/paste, some can only do this when the field with data is a text box. By selecting Text (large) box, you enable the copy for URLs.

To allow using the keypad to go back to the previous screen select also use keypad and other commands.... This is used on item form. If this is difficult to read, turn it off as it is device dependent.
To pick font size when allow using keypad.
If the fields are hard to read, you may want to go to settings and change to use commands to go back to previous screen.
Save bookmarks (feeds) and items, but do not exit.
If this form has problems with the text fields, you may need to disable using the keypad by going to settings and disabling it.

Exit after saving bookmarks (feeds) and items. This allows items to be read offline if they were loaded from before. By contrast, if you kill the program only bookmarks will be saved as killing does not allow saving everything.
Font not supported by device. Reset to default or pick another font.
